statements: DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE humidity > 60 OR temperature < 20;
DELETE FROM temperature_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM temperature_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE type = 'humidity' AND location = 'room1'
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
